kaitiakiFeaturesDescription: Turn on/off the features available to kaitiaki of this community
memberFeaturesDescription: Turn on/off the features available to members and kaitiaki of this community
acceptCredentialsDescription: Activate this setting to accept tribal membership credentials with new registrations
issueCredentialsDescription: Activate this setting if you would like to issue digital membership credentials to new members
configHelpText: Note: To properly set up verified credential features, you will need to add configuration to the configuration file below. See https://docs.ahau.io/#/credentials_guide for more information.
